Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.3 Paccayavāra » 2.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Indriya
Kusalattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Indriya
129.
482Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati indriyapaccayā…pe…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā…pe…  cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…  kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā khandhā.
483(Indriyapaccayā yathā kammapaccayā, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
<< Āhāraup Jhāna-magga >>
